org.apache.james.mailbox.store.transaction

Interface Mapper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MailboxMapper<Id>, MessageMapper<Id>, SubscriptionMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJCRScalingMapper, AbstractMessageMapper, HBaseMailboxMapper, HBaseMessageMapper, HBaseNonTransactionalMapper, HBaseSubscriptionMapper, InMemoryMailboxMapper, InMemoryMessageMapper, InMemorySubscriptionMapper, JCRMailboxMapper, JCRMessageMapper, JCRSubscriptionMapper, JPAMailboxMapper, JPAMessageMapper, JPASubscriptionMapper, JPATransactionalMapper, MaildirMailboxMapper, MaildirMessageMapper, MaildirSubscriptionMapper, NonTransactionalMapper, TransactionalMapper

    public interface Mapper
    Mapper which execute units of work in a Mapper.Transaction
